      public Food(String name, int origin, boolean isVegetarian, int calories)

      Parameters:
      name - food name
      origin - food origin code
      isVegetarian - whether food is vegetarian
      calories - caloric content of food

  • Method Details

    • originsMenu

      public static String originsMenu()
      Creates a string of food origins in the format: 
          Origins
    0 Canadian
    1 Chinese
    ...
    11 English
      Returns:
      A formatted numbered string of valid food origins.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Food target)
      Foods are compared by name, then by origin if the names match. Must ignore case.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Food>

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string version of a Food object in the form: 
          Name:       name
    Origin:     origin string
    Vegetarian: true/false
    Calories:   calories
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • write

      public void write(PrintStream ps)
      Writes a single line of food data to an open PrintStream. The contents of food are written as a string in the format name|origin|isVegetarian|calories to ps.
      Parameters:
      ps - The PrintStream to write to.
